title: Did the NA servers just go down?
body: I was in the middle of a game, and I want to make sure it wasn't just my internet, lol.

replies.body: There may have been some down periods while we had patch maintenance.  We posted this a few days ago on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Bookmark it to stay updated on server news!

About 2 hours ago would have been when the patch happened, they are usually about this time every week.

Any active games should be finished as a 'dead game' (game just stops and everyone disconnects, no one wins or loses).
